titles.title: To provide payment for patient navigator services under title XIX of the Social Security Act, and for other purposes.
Patient Navigation Assistance Act of 2018
Patient Navigation Assistance Act of 2018
Patient Navigation Assistance Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Patient Navigation Assistance Act of 2018
This bill requires state Medicaid programs to cover patient navigator services.
